### read in the data

```{r}
dom <- owid_get("time-spent-in-domestic-work-female-vs-male") %>%
  rename(country = "entity_name", female = "x_5_4_1__sl_dom_tspd__15_years_old_and_over__all_areas__female", male = "x_5_4_1__sl_dom_tspd__15_years_old_and_over__all_areas__male") %>%
  filter(year > 2000) %>%
  select(-owid_region, -entity_id) %>%
  filter(!is.na(female))

min_max <- dom %>% 
  group_by(country) %>%
  summarise(max_year = first(year), min_year=last(year))

```
